website_summaries.verdict: This reusable, notebook-sized bag has 2 sets of hook-and-loop closures to keep any odors inside.
pros: Certified smell proof and dog tested
Double hook-and-loop seal so no odors escape the bag
cons: Hook-and-loop closure is not attached to the bag very well

customer_reviews.title: Dog Tested?!?
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this bag I was going through border patrol near Tombstone AZ, their dogs alerted them to me as I pulled up to the station. I took less than half a second for the dog to start growling at my car. They had me pull to the side and they searched my car with the dog and they found my MMJ in the Discreet Smoker Smell Proof Bag. I had my MMJ card with me so they let me go but the kept the half OZ. I should have known that this was a crappy product when their logo is an image of a pot leaf as a necktie.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Tight, tight, tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag to keep my "stuff" from stinking up my backpack and to keep eyes off of me when I enter a bus or trolly to get to school. It is super durable so I'm not worried about it getting damaged from rumbling around my backpack all day. There's a ton of room, and it doesn't smell at all! Perfect size for every day use, and plenty of room to bring extra "stuff" and equipment to a kickback or bonfire. I'm super happy with this product, I also have the smaller bag that comes with an awesome hemp satchel, it works just as well! Great company for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag - Loud
customer_reviews.text: Great bag that really does keep the smell in, but it's important to notice that it is a double-velcro bag. It's is not quiet when you open of close it. This was not a problem for me, but is important to note. Bag feels very well made and durable, and is a decent size for storing a decent amount of stuff. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks K.

customer_reviews.title: It works a 5 star product for all recreational and medical patients
customer_reviews.text: Doubt its dog proof, but my room doesnt smell and I can carry whatever I need in this bag with no stench luring. Beware that once you do open this bag it will smell of the contents that are in the bag in seconds. 5 stars though a great way to carry everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: A GUY WHO ENJOYS REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Left some stinky stuff in this bag in my car for 8 hours and it was pretty hot that day opened my door and nothing zero ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is unreal. Left some stinky stuff in this bag in my car for 8 hours and it was pretty hot that day opened my door and nothing zero smell. I hope this lasts for awhile. Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Al. G

customer_reviews.title: My go-to pickup bag
customer_reviews.text: When you hit up your local dispensaries you'll definitely need this bag. The interior compartment is practically designed and spacious, the smellproof liner is quite effective and the velcro rip opening is a cinch to operate one-handed at the cash register. Company customer service has proven to be second to none in my experience as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: basalawarmi

customer_reviews.title: No smell
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for someone with medical marijuana card. There spouse didnt like the smell of the flower since its strong. This bag works no smell or even traces of scent plus large enough to store everything in it needed to use your marijuana
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M Houtz

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great design and so far so good! My herb is very dank and so I needed something that would hold that back. I was hesitant about the velcro but it works great! No problems here.
customer_reviews.author: Brady K.

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I will keep it simple. This bag is a LIFESAVER. 100 % smell proof, portable, easy and quality. GREAT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice that I have a good looking bag to securely ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, Velcro on the inside and the outside. This fixed my aroma issues. It's nice that I have a good looking bag to securely keep my products in.
customer_reviews.author: Alice S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I was looking for. Small yet effective - can’t smell at all through it, discreet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bet ur freedom on it! Haha
customer_reviews.text: If u got some loud this is not covering it up lol does cut the smell a little bit but still made my car smell...
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product.
customer_reviews.text: Best. Investment. Ever. My husband is an avid pot smoker. This bag keeps in all smells. It's amazing. It's also large enough to keep in all your smoking essentials. He stores up to 7 grams of bud, his grinder, his bowl and a lighter. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, smell proof
customer_reviews.text: VERY smell proof, you wouldn’t even notice and smells coming from this bag. Very thick and durable. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Wohlhart

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Velcro Equals poor sealing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same bag several months back. The two that I received this purchase are made different. They have pockets inside which I don't mind but the Velcro does not stick together at all. Which completely defeats the purpose of the bag. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Suuuuper smell proof
customer_reviews.text: At first I had my doubts I have a sensitive nose and can smell everything , my husband uses this for his herb and I can’t smell anything!! Love these
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo E. Sarabia

customer_reviews.title: Damn good bag,
customer_reviews.text: Damn good bag,, I walk around with Quarter pounds of really strong smelling marijuana and yo wouldn’t even be able to tell until I open the bag,,, 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽 Great for dealing
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fits my small tray
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m loving the fact that my entire tray fits inside. Have not smell tested yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Rhon

customer_reviews.title: What stinks?........ ABSOLUTELY NOTHING!😂
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag....it stores all my "stinky" stuff with literally 0 outside sent, once properly sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Tks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great at being smell proof! Nice strong Velcro and good quality, no complains have had it since december 2017 and its june 3rd 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Didnt come with grinder or rolling paper
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I wasn't to excited or heavily reliant on the grinder or rolling paper be it didnt come in at all. As advertised but other than that it's a very smell proof bag. It doesnt leak. It is sealed by double velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely smell proof. Also large enough to fit everything you need. Even a small bong or bubbler. The velcro is kinda loud
customer_reviews.author: Carter Napoli

customer_reviews.title: better than i thought
customer_reviews.text: i was hesitant to buy this bag at first because of the mixed reviews, but after trying it for myself i couldn’t be more satisfied with the product! it does everything as promised plus mine even came with a little lock on it to keep fiends from going through my bag :)
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture
customer_reviews.text: Picture showed a divider. Came as 1 large pouch. Unless for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spear

customer_reviews.title: Don't Use Freezer Bags!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. But if first impressions mean anything, great improvement over freezer bags!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG this product is amazing!!! Absolutely no smell and very discreet.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyC

customer_reviews.title: Buy this 👍🏻👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag! High quality while fitting a lot on the go! It really does cap the smell and help you feel at easy carrying cannabis in public!
customer_reviews.author: The Dutchess

customer_reviews.title: This bag has a fantastic build and serious scent blocking, honestly i'm amazed
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty big, surprisingly enough to hold another small bag filled with pipes. So with all that in there as well as my ancient and potent grinder and a med bottle of the stank dank I can't smell anything when it's properly sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Monado Boy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Covers up the smell of my copious amount of oregano.
customer_reviews.author: Rick volcanoes

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was NOT smell proof. And no zipper was a silly idea with this product. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lil beat up too quick but keeps the smell in while I keep de herbs from sticking up the place. Bigger than I thought too. Holds alot.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyGrave

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well! Not super big but big enough I can fit my piece and weed in there. Covers the smell beautifully ! Only problem is it’s double Velcrow so a bit loud when opening but other than that perfect! Got here super fast too
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit weary of Velcro’s ability seal odors at first, but after using the bag I’m sold! No more mason jar to mess with and no more scent. This things the best!
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but is hard to open with all the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Mike the buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK product, poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro wasn't attached all the way. I had to put some gel super glue behind the Velcro to fix it. Its a good product but the quality control is not there. I don't know if I would go for the bag design again either.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, used regularly w/ no issues
customer_reviews.text: Use this on a daily basis. Very effective in controlling odor, even with the most pungent contents inside.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Redlich

customer_reviews.title: Buy it DOOD
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it needs to do, but as with any smell proof container... I’d buy again if I needed another bag! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well if the velcro lasted...
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few months since I have gotten the bags and the Velcro strips are already tearing apart from the actual bag. I am giving it 2 because it does work just that the Velcro didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shih

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, it works
customer_reviews.text: This lil bag hide smellls real good. Specially weed smelll I got that fire and it worked I strongly recommend no more rapping up your jars and zip bag😝😝😝
customer_reviews.author: Myrina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... smells are contained entirely. Definitely serving its purpose in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine G

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this bag. Does exactly as described. We have recommended to plenty of people.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Swanson

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Product is a amazing and highly recommend. Trust me you will be happy with this purchase. Seals all smells with double Velcro strap and it’s a nice material as well. You can hide all of your herbs!!
customer_reviews.author: Shayron

customer_reviews.title: keeps smell in perfectly, but i only had it ...
customer_reviews.text: keeps smell in perfectly, but i only had it for a few months before the seam ripped. if you are gentle with it it should work great
customer_reviews.author: Sam Terry

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived torn open and defeats the purpose of what I purchased it for I ended up throwing it away
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product. Can’t smell even the smelliest herbs and has plenty of pockets/space for my equipment

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: Clean af,, can fit a trey, grinder, and a small jar in that Jawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent way to keep items fresh and discreetly stored. you can't smell the herbs and they stay fresh longer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price...tested with dog treats and worked as expected
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great if you want to take some “stuff” with you on an adventure! No one will smell a thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve been a 5 star but some of the stitching ...
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve been a 5 star but some of the stitching is coming off. When it comes to blocking out smell does it 100%. Wish it had different compartments to keep track of things
customer_reviews.author: Keven Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product & does exactly what it says it does
customer_reviews.author: Kay Banks

customer_reviews.title: Not quality. Just out of return
customer_reviews.text: My Velcro came apart after a month, but seller fixed problem ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all you dank herbs nice and discreet with double velco seal
customer_reviews.text: Truely smell proof. Keeps all you dank herbs nice and discreet with double velco seal, highly recomended.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great, it's the perfect size and you really can't smell anything.
customer_reviews.author: Donte

customer_reviews.title: It's smell proof
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag it works great for what I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Brian Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the bag works well but -1 star because the package arrived open
customer_reviews.author: shawnknight133

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised so far. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Keeps smell in. Not much else I could ask ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps smell in. Not much else I could ask for. Has a weird marijuana leaf on the front though. Quality is average. Nothing too special here.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Stanman

customer_reviews.title: Buy the skunk brand over this brand, trust me.
customer_reviews.text: It works but the quality of the stitching and velcro is not as good as the "skunk" branded carbon bags. I was a little disappointed that I went with this brand to be honest. The skunk bag I currently have is a much nicer build than this. The velco is obviously not of good quality and when I opened this bag up there were pieces of loose stitching everywhere. I do like the size of it, but I have doubts that this will hold up longer than a year. I'll check back in with an update. The handle is also something I could do without.
customer_reviews.author: JT H.

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. It does exactly what it says also
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. It does exactly what it says also. I happen to have some really stinky stuff right now and when you close the bag as intended it works perfectly. I will be ordering more of these of different sizes. My only complaint and it isnt reallly a complaint is that this version is a large bag. It iss the size as described on the website but i didnt actually pay it as much attention as i should have. My mistake not the manufacturer or sellers fault. I honestly did not think this bag would work as well as it does but it really does.
customer_reviews.author: jwoody

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tested it out before putting it to real ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not contain the smell at all, even when the bag wasn't very full and the velcro was securely fastened. There is nothing to actually seal it air tight, so the smell permeates right through. Glad I tested it out before putting it to real use.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Harden

customer_reviews.title: The Big IF...
customer_reviews.text: This product works IF your item inside is not just in a ziploc bag. It was tested with the product layered in a ziploc plus an exit bag, and just the ziploc alone. The smellproof properties of this carrying bag work well IF there is an additional layer of protection inside. The hook and loop "velcro" seal should be pressed firmly and securely. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JENERIC

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, made of durable material, and smell-proof indeed! I love the logo, too! It's great for backpacks and luggage, traveling in general. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Good size--but wish it was a bit wider. Its like a large envelope, which can make it hard to store with stuff inside as it is lumpy and awkward. Does the job though--as long as you Velcro it correctly you wont get any smell at all. If the Velcro is even slightly off, you'll start to get the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Fairbrothers

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I really pride myself on making Amazon reviews because that's what makes it most easiet to buy a product. This bag is seriously amazing. It is big and I can keep all my products in there and it is completely smell proof. Keep it in my car no problemo. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for its purpose. You can not smell anything inside of it. ;) Believe me I have had some seriously smelly stuff in there and not even the dog is catching a whiff of it.
customer_reviews.author: Remnant Fury

customer_reviews.title: Not really smell proof
customer_reviews.text: Mine isnt really smell proof. I have to put my "smelly items" in a ziplock or another container before putting in here. Even the ziplock doesnt mask the smell in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Strong and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This bag is large enough to hold your herbal products and all accessories. I have not tried it, but I bet it can contain a small tray. Internally there are 2 mesh pockets. The bag secures two with strong velcro. Once closed no aroma escapes at all.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shar

customer_reviews.title: Delete the "green tie" !
customer_reviews.text: Great product built very sturdy and does the job well...only thing to improve is DELETE the "green tie" emblem..I used a fat sharpie and blacked it out to make the bag truly stealth . Other than that I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: workingman1

customer_reviews.title: I TESTED IT
customer_reviews.text: I honestly am so surprised of how perfect it works. I was worried when it said velcro but man, i tested this so much. I left it in a car in a hot day and it smelled like nothing. I got brought it to my girlfriend's fathers house and it was like it was never there. I recommend this really great investment if you are a outdoors person like me traveling around.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Chavez

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLY SMELL PROOF!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how well this REALLY contains odors! WOW! Am going to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Amans Catti

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: This bag definitely does it’s job. The Velcro is crazy strong. I just wish it was a little smaller. It’s kinda large and noticeable. But it is well made and does what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Holds in sock odors...
customer_reviews.text: I'm just using it for dirty socks in a small truck, but I can put several pair in the bag over the course of a week & ZERO smell when I open the door.
customer_reviews.author: Skinny

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend, keeps all scents in the bag, easy to travel with. Get lots of compliments on it, seriously lol
customer_reviews.author: Emerzon estrada

customer_reviews.title: Its great for holding in the smells when I need to ...
customer_reviews.text: This large smell proof bag/case actually works!! it holds in all my herb smells and has room for my rolling tray,rolling papers, grinder and other smoking accessories in my kit. Its great for holding in the smells when I need to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Zazoo

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my fiancé because I was tired of ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiancé because I was tired of smelling his stash in our car or tiny livimg space. He's been using it for about 6 months now and it's held up really well and I can saying lives up to the claims.
customer_reviews.author: Krissi Sixx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent odor protection
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag recently and am very happy. Total odor protection. And there was a lot of odor.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Cat

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect size for me and it works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for me and it works as advertised. My wife has a sensitive nose and she smells nothing.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Smell proof but entire inner Velcro came apart
customer_reviews.text: Smell proof, discrete and quick delivery. I’d give this 5 stars if it weren’t for the quality. By the end of the first week, the inside Velcro came completely off. Unless mine was defective, quality is mediocre.
customer_reviews.author: Cma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome works well...i use it for my erbs and it does not smell!👌
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this with concentrates so far but it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Cline

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product! Truly is smell proof and keeps my ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the big version! Keeps my dank herb smell in one place! Absolutely amazing product! Truly is smell proof and keeps my car and house smelling great!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Gamblin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. No smell, holds plenty and easy to conceal
customer_reviews.author: kevin r hunninghaus

customer_reviews.title: Effective smell proof bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great for travelling, had no problems on air or ground with transportation.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Already broke
customer_reviews.text: Masks the smell but I've had it less then 3 months and the Velcro on the inside already has fallen off, therefor making the bag useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Ann Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: recipient is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, recipient is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: aloha808

customer_reviews.title: ... my smell proof container on time and it works great. My bag no longer smells like smoking accessories ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my smell proof container on time and it works great. My bag no longer smells like smoking accessories and my pets will not be able to tear into it, so that gives me peace of mind. Lots of room for all my stuff, so I can keep it all in one place. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This was really helpful when I had to be discreet at mother-in-laws house. No smell in the house at all. So I vaped outside and put vaporizer in this bag to bring in house. Perfectly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Silverstein

product_meta.title: Large Smell Proof Bag 11x9 - Store all your Smelly accessories, Rolling paper, Grinder and Rolling tray DOG TESTED
product_meta.description: Color:BlackHide all your Stash box smells in this wonderful odor locking, smell proof bag. It locks all smells tightly inside its carbon lining. So no one knows whats inside the bag. For the person who likes to keep a large amount of Herb stashed safely at their home, the bag is large enough to handle the stash, and anything that you use for smoking that may have that rich aroma you want to hide from others.Its big Enough to store all your accessories such as rolling paper rolling tray grinder.
feature_bullets: 11x9 Reusable Smell Proof Bag - Hides the smell and keeps your items fresh Certified Smell Proof Bag - Dog tested
Certified Smell Proof Bag - Dog tested
Great for storing all your Spices and accessories
Double Velcro seal - So no smells or odors can escape the bag
Discreet looking - No one knows what is inside
